sense.def:
To have a hunch that something is true
pomeni misliti, da je nekaj verjetno res;

seg.quote: Morris had a hunch that she was a good cook.
Watson frequently acted on a hunch.

sense.def:
To hunch somewhere
pomeni potegniti ramena skupaj in spustiti brado na prsi.

seg.quote: I was cold as I hunched over my meagre fire.
